snippet.title: Easy Red 2 - Launch Trailer (1.0)
snippet.description:
ꜜꜜꜜInfo and linksꜜꜜꜜ


•Description:
Fight massive battles between infantry, armored vehicles, tanks, cannons and planes. Realistically manage your weapons and equipment, coordinate with your squad, and tactically navigate large, fully destructible open world maps. Experience the WW2 in singleplayer, PVP and Co-Op.

•Release date:
Easy Red 2 will be released into 1.0 Version soon in January 2022.
Still, feedback and suggestions will be heard to improve the game over the time.

•Get Easy Red 2:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1324780/Easy_Red_2/

•Join the Discord to discuss the development and play together:
https://discord.com/invite/ksfaFUfec3
